TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Bob_Allen, title = Bob_Allen, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Allen} }

S.FORM: Bob Allen nalecuhan i Amilika, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Bob Allen i 1968 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 6 ku uwac atu silsil 71, namapili' tu nu San Francisco Warriors putiput. 7 bulad 17 demiad, 1946 a mihca, Bob Allen, miunduay.

Bob Allen nalecohan i Amilika, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Bob Allen i 1968 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 6 ko owac ato silsil 71, namapili' to no San Francisco Warriors potipot. 7 bolad 17 demiad, 1946 a mihca, Bob Allen, miondoay.
